meanings.definition: A large, thick-skinned mammal with one or two horns on the nose.
meanings.sent1: The rhino at the zoo was huge and had a horn on its nose.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the rhino in school during our animal lesson.
meanings.sent3: The rhino tried to wear a hat on its horn but it kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: In the wild, the rhino stood proudly with its horn shining in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the rhino's size and horn.

meanings.sent1: I need to save up more rhino to buy that new video game.
meanings.sent2: He made a lot of rhino from selling his old comic book collection.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her piggy bank was full of rhino instead of coins.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur saw opportunities to earn rhino in various investments.
meanings.sent5: The rhino in his wallet was just enough to cover the cost of dinner.
